languages.text: "Верно". {n}Ирлиэт приподнимает тонкие брови.{/n} "Иногда меня удивляет глубина твоих познаний об обычаях моего народа, элантах. Но даже если ты просто умеешь слушать — это уже возвышает тебя над миллиардами прочих мон-кай".

"Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Верно". {n}Ирлиэт приподнимает тонкие брови.{/n} "Иногда меня удивляет глубина твоих познаний об обычаях моего народа, элантах. Но даже если ты просто умеешь слушать — это уже возвышает тебя над миллиардами прочих мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sí». {n}Yrliet levanta sus delicadas cejas.{/n} «A veces me sorprende cuánto sabes sobre las costumbres de mi pueblo, elantach. Pero aunque escuchar sea tu único talento, solo con eso ya estás muy por encima de otros miles de millones de mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Sí». {n}Yrliet levanta sus delicadas cejas.{/n} «A veces me sorprende cuánto sabes sobre las costumbres de mi pueblo, elantach. Pero aunque escuchar sea tu único talento, solo con eso ya estás muy por encima de otros miles de millones de mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだ」{n}ユリエットは繊細な眉を上げた。{/n}「我の種族の習慣に関するお前の知識の深さには、時に驚かされる、エランタ。聞くことがお前の唯一の能力だとしても、それだけで他の無数のモン＝ケイより優れている」
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ」{n}ユリエットは繊細な眉を上げた。{/n}「我の種族の習慣に関するお前の知識の深さには、時に驚かされる、エランタ。聞くことがお前の唯一の能力だとしても、それだけで他の無数のモン＝ケイより優れている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “没错。”{n}伊莉耶特扬起了她精致的眉毛。{/n}“外界人，有时我很惊讶，你对我们种族习俗竟然如此了解。不过，哪怕你唯一擅长的技能只有倾听，这也足以让你比其他几十亿只猴子更加优秀。”
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “没错。”{n}伊莉耶特扬起了她精致的眉毛。{/n}“外界人，有时我很惊讶，你对我们种族习俗竟然如此了解。不过，哪怕你唯一擅长的技能只有倾听，这也足以让你比其他几十亿只猴子更加优秀。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, {n}répond Yrliet en haussant ses fins sourcils.{/n} Je suis parfois surprise par vos connaissances des usages de mon peuple, elantach. Mais même si l'écoute est votre seul talent, il vous élève tout de même au-dessus de milliards d'autres mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {n}répond Yrliet en haussant ses fins sourcils.{/n} Je suis parfois surprise par vos connaissances des usages de mon peuple, elantach. Mais même si l'écoute est votre seul talent, il vous élève tout de même au-dessus de milliards d'autres mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ja." {n}Yrliet hebt ihre zarten Brauen.{/n} "Manchmal überrascht es mich, wie viel Ihr über die Bräuche meiner Art wisst, Elantach. Doch selbst, wenn Zuhören Eure einzige Fähigkeit ist, schon das erhebt Euch über Milliarden anderer Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ja." {n}Yrliet hebt ihre zarten Brauen.{/n} "Manchmal überrascht es mich, wie viel Ihr über die Bräuche meiner Art wisst, Elantach. Doch selbst, wenn Zuhören Eure einzige Fähigkeit ist, schon das erhebt über Milliarden anderer Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

languages.text: "Evet." {n}Yrliet, zarif kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bazen halkımın geleneklerine dair bu denli bilgili olman beni şaşırtıyor elantach. Tek yeteneğin dinlemek olsa bu bile seni milyonlarca mon-keigh'den üstün kılardı."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Yrliet arches her delicate brows.{/n} "I am sometimes surprised by the depth of your knowledge of my kind's customs, elantach. But even if listening is your only skill, that in itself elevates you above billions of other mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Evet." {n}Yrliet, zarif kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bazen halkımın geleneklerine dair bu denli bilgili olman beni şaşırtıyor elantach. Tek yeteneğin dinlemek olsaydı bile bu seni yine milyonlarca mon-keighden üstün tutar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
